title: 1997년 Nason 사건
summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Nason. 판결일: 1997-02-25. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Missouri, Plaintiff/Respondent v. Larry NASON, Defendant/Appellant Larry NASON, Movant/Appellant v. STATE of Missouri, Respondent/Respondent
**판결일**: 1997-02-25
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

**판사**: Dowd, Gaertner, Reinhard

## 변호인

Gwenda R. Robinson, Assistant Public Defender, St. Louis, for appellant., Jeremiah W. (Jay) Nixon, Attorney General, Stephen D. Hawke, Assistant Attorney General, Jefferson City, for respondent.

## 인용

- 939 S.W.2d 533

## 판결문 요약



ORDER

PER CURIAM.
Defendant appeals after his conviction by a jury of one count of first degree burglary, § 569.160, RSMo 1994. The court sentenced him as a prior and persistent offender to a prison term of twenty years. Defendant also appeals the denial, without an evidentiary hearing, of his Rule 29.15 motion for post-conviction relief. We affirm.
We have reviewed the record and find the claims of error are without merit; the judgment of the motion court is based on findings of fact that are not clearly erroneous. An opinion would have no precedential value nor serve any jurisprudential purpose. The parties have been furnished with a memorandum for their information only, setting forth the *534reasons for this order affirming the judgment pursuant to Rules 30.25(b) and 84.16(b).
...
